summary:
## Lemons: A Sour Powerhouse

Lemons are small, evergreen trees originally from Asia. Their yellow, ellipsoidal fruits are tart and juicy, packed with citric acid which makes them super sour (pH 2.2). This sour taste is why we use lemon juice in drinks, food, and even cleaning products.  The pulp and rind are also used in cooking, making lemons a versatile kitchen ingredient.
title: Lemon
